short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace a random image on any website you visit with a Rickroll gif.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace random images on any website with the iconic Rickroll gif! This fun Chrome extension lets you customize how many images get replaced and easily toggle the feature on or off. Access all settings with a single click on the extension icon.

Please note: On some websites, images may not be replaced due to stricter Content Security Policy restrictions or if the images are hidden by CSS rules.
